data.title: NBC Special
data.text:
NBCâ€™s Christmas at Graceland special

Elvis Presley's Graceland was delighted to host The Christmas at Graceland special, which premiered on NBC on Wednesday, November 29th. The special featured music's biggest stars coming together to celebrate the legacy of Elvis Presley and ring in the holiday season at the King of Rock 'n' Roll's beloved home, Graceland!

With a special appearance by Riley Keough and these magical performances...

Lainey Wilson at Graceland Mansion

Lana Del Rey in the Jungle Room

Alanis Morissette at the Lisa Marie Airplane

John Legend at Graceland's Chapel in the Woods

Kacey Musgraves at Graceland Mansion

Kane Brown at the Graceland Stable

Post Malone at Graceland Mansion Pool

The War And Treaty at the Graceland Soundstage

If you missed Christmas at Graceland last night on NBC, catch it now streaming on Peacock.

Plan your own CHRISTMAS AT Graceland!

Now that you have seen NBC's Christmas at Graceland special, come see the place Elvis called home! Explore the beautiful Graceland mansion, exhibits showcasing Elvis' career, his automobiles, his wardrobe, his gold records, his custom jets, and much more from the Graceland Archives! There is no better place to live the legacy of the king than at Elvis Presley's Graceland in Memphis.

GET TICKETS
